original_text: When the boy had left, David came out from beside the rock. He went down on his knees in front of Jonathan. He bent down on the ground three times. Then David and Jonathan kissed each other and they wept. David wept even more than Jonathan did.
korean_text: 아이가 가매 다윗이 곧 바위 남쪽에서 일어나서 땅에 엎드려 세 번 절한 후에 서로 입 맞추고 같이 울되 다윗이 더욱 심하더니

sentences.original_text: David came out from beside the rock
He went down on his knees
He bent down on the ground three times
Then David and Jonathan kissed each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗과 요나단은 서로에게 입을 맞췄다

sentences.original_text: David wept even more than Jonathan did
